#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,x=0,temp,power=1;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d",&n);
              temp=n;
              while(n!=0)
              {
                         x=x+(n%10);
                         n=n/10;
              }
              for(i=0;i<x;i++)
              power=power*2;
              printf("%d\n",temp*power);
              x=0;power=1;
              
    }
    return 0;
}
